hero.name: Francois Meiring
hero.description: Passionate about technology, continuous learning, and exploring new horizons. Every challenge is an opportunity to grow.

memoryLane.title: A Trip Down Memory Lane
memoryLane.subtitle: Moments and adventures that have shaped my journey

memories.title: Playing Guitar
memories.description: Music has always been a creative outlet for me. Whether strumming chords or composing melodies, the guitar helps me express ideas beyond words and code.

memories.title: Family Graduation
memories.description: Celebrating achievements with the people who matter most. This milestone represents years of dedication, support, and the foundation that continues to drive my ambitions.

memories.title: St. Lucia Adventure
memories.description: Exploring new places fuels my curiosity and broadens my perspective. Travel teaches me to embrace different cultures and see the world through fresh eyes.

memories.title: Modeling
memories.description: Stepping outside my comfort zone has taught me confidence and adaptability. Trying new experiences reminds me that growth happens when we dare to be different.
